title: Software ate the world. Now AI is eating software.
full_text:
Software ate the world. Now AI is eating software.. What was once a stable and profitable tech business now faces an existential question: What happens if AI tools and agents replace business software?. Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei at The World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland.Fortune via Reuters Connect
  • Anthropic's new legal AI tools rattled software stocks this week.
